title: TeleScopic Quadcopter
detail: Quadcopter that will be able to change it size, and balance objects.
extended_details: Morphing quadcopter that has ability to change it shape. With new interest, and innovation in quadcopter technology this will help quadcopters be able to maneuver around tight corners. In search&rescue missions or disaster situations you never know where you have to drive through. This will allow it to carry heavy payload, and get through narrow areas.
